Name: Pewt 'em Up!
About the game: Pewt 'em Up! is a retro inspired arcade space shoot 'em up. The game features a Stage Mode in which you follow the story of Cadet Claire Voyage, a roguelite Endless Mode, lots of upgrades, achievements, extras like gallery, music player and more.
